dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4360 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Forest Service for the Grandfather Ranger District located at 109 Lawing Drive in Nebo, North Carolina, as the “Jason Crisp Forest Service Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Meadows (for himself, Mr. Butterfield, Mrs. Ellmers, Mr. Jones, Mr. Price of North Carolina, Ms. Foxx, Mr. Coble, Mr. McIntyre, Mr. Hudson, Mr. Pittenger, Mr. McHenry, and Mr. Holding) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Forest Service for the Grandfather Ranger District located at 109 Lawing Drive in Nebo, North Carolina, as the Jason Crisp Forest Service Building.

section.header: Designation of Jason Crisp Forest Service Building, Nebo, North Carolina

subsection.text: The facility of the Grandfather Ranger District of the United States Forest Service located at 109 Lawing Drive in Nebo, North Carolina, shall be known and designated as the Jason Crisp Forest Service Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Jason Crisp Forest Service Building.
